name: Untitled Ship Game
description:
Made for the GT:Jam 2020 by the Harry Hill Fan Club

The year is 20XX. As a member of the ITV task force, it's your job to save Harry Hill after he was kidnapped by the BBC to make him write their shows! Using your fighter ship, take on the BBC forces and win back Harry Hill so he can make the nation laugh once more.

Moving The Ship - WASD
Fire Projectile - Space Bar
Quit Game - Escape
